Header: “Cold Pursuit” scheduled to be released this Friday
Content: “Cold Pursuit” is an upcoming American action film directed by Hans Petter Moland from a screenplay by Frank Baldwin. It stars Liam Neeson, Laura Dern, Emmy Rossum, William Forsythe and Tom Bateman. Nels Coxman’s quiet life as a snowplow driver in a glitzy Rocky Mountains resort town where he was just awarded Citizen of the Year is disrupted when his beloved son is murdered under mysterious circumstances. His search for the cause turns into a quest for revenge against a psychotic drug lord named Viking. The film is scheduled to be released in the United States this Friday by Summit Entertainment.
